title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8046.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8046.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) IR 390. The
northbound and southbound roadways of IR 390 between Route 17 and the

Steuben-Livingston county line in the Village of Avoca and Towns of Avoca, Cohocton, Wayland and Dansville. (b) Route 17. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of Route 17 between the Allegany- Steuben county line and the

Steuben-Chemung county line in the City of Corning, Villages of Bath, Savona, Painted Post and Riverside and Towns of Hornellsville, Fremont, Howard, Avoca, Bath, Campbell, Irwin and Corning. (c) US Route 15. The northbound and
southbound roadways of US Route 15 between CR 5 in Presho and Route 17 in the

Village of Painted Post and Towns of Lindley and Irwin. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8046.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
